bank2.cop

Copland Source

*rp, n: @ks [av us bmon]
  +<+ @us bmon us exts

Abstract Syntax Tree

Execution Semantics: bank2.gli

  & prec(e2, e5).

ms_evt(E) => E = e2 | E = e5.
